summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Schools; authorizing the Director of Administrative Services to enter into an interjurisdictional agreement with the Superintendent of Seattle Schools for lease of vehicles from the Department of Administrative Services to the Seattle School District; authorizing the Director and the Purchasing Agent to enter into financing agreements for capital equipment; conditionally authorizing the City Comptroller to issue obligations of the City to provide alternative financing for such acquisition and providing payment therefor.
